name: Andre M Chagas
cooked:
Hey @jgriessen,

I see your post is from a while ago, but maybe this is something you are still working on? If so, I would recommend you to join the GOSH forum there is an active community there talking about open source hardware for science.

best regards,
Andre
raw:
Hey @jgriessen,

I see your post is from a while ago, but maybe this is something you are still working on? If so, I would recommend you to join the [GOSH forum](https://forum.openhardware.science/) there is an active community there talking about open source hardware for science. 

best regards,
Andre
